TEXT.S:
Slovakia
kakilimaan u Slovakia sa i labu nu O-cuo, itiza i 48 40 N, 19 30 E. u ahebal nu lala' mapulung sa izaw ku 49,035 km2.u ahebal nu lala'ay sa izaw ku 48,105 km2, u ahebal nu nanumay sa izaw ku 930 km2. hamin nu tademawan sa 5,445,802. kakalukan umah sa 40.10%, kilakilangan umah sa 40.20%, zumaay henay umah sa 19.70%.
nilacul tapang tusu nu kanatalu tapang tusu nu kanatal sa u Bratislava.
kakinginan nu kanatal demiadkakinging nu kanatal demiad sa 1 bulad 9 demiad.
tabakiay a tapang nu kanatalu tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) ayza sa ci Zuzana Čaputová (Susanna.Caputuwa ·), 1973 a mihca 6 a bulad 21 a demiad nalecuhan. u tabakiay a tapang nu kanatal (congtung) nu Slovakiaayza, micakat a demiad sa i 2019 a mihca 6 bulad 15 demiad.
cunliu cunli nu Slovakiaayza sa ci Eduard Heger (·), micakat a demiad sa i 2021 a mihcaan 4 bulad 1 demiad.
Czechoslovakia likisi19181992-- Czechoslovakiai cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan katukuh i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan idaw ku tusa (1992) a mahcaan u O-cuoa kanatal, mabulesak satu tahekl ku tusaay misitekeday a kanatal - Czechiaatu Czechoslovakia. 1918 Czechoslovakiapatideng i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan, itida i Cuo-o, u Czechiaatu Slovakiamisakaput, tawyaay a kanatal nu ngangan u Slovensko, itini i cacay katukuh tu tusaay a nikalepacawan, tawya namaka celcel henay tu saka kitakit nu saka pitu a tabakiay nu kakakulian.
itini i saka tusa anikalepacawan, Czechoslovakiaa niyadu hiyan nu Nacuy-Dekuomidebung, itin i kakakuliyana nu kakitidaan patideng tu Bohemiaatu Moraviadadiputen a kanatal atu Czechoslovakianu tusaay a dadadimawan nu kanatal, duma a niyaduan hiyan nu Polandatu Hungaryamikelic. 1960 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan,Czechoslovakiamisumad tu ngangan u Czechoslovakiasiakay cui kunhekuo.
sumamadan a likisi3001867 Czechoslovakiaa niyadu' itida i Ocuonu teban, pisitekedan sa nuheni nama hiya nu Hapu-sepaw-wancawpatidenga tu Awtili-tikuomikuwan makala tu tulu a pina (300) a lasubu ku tenes, cacay a malebut walu a lasubu enem a bataan idaw ku pitu (1867) a mihcaan Awtlli-tikuomisumad tu kaput mala Aw'cun-tikuo, Czechiaatu Slovakianiyadu' mikelic sipabeli i Austriaatu Hungary. 1918 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu cacay a bataan idaw ku walu (1918) a mihcaan misatadas malepacaw tu hedek, Awcun-tikuomademec mabulasak, Bohemia, Moravia, Slovakiaa niyadu' misakaput misitekeday a kanatal, pangangan han u Czechoslovakiamisiteked satu kina kitakit, Czechoslovakiaa sakaudip amelik satu mucelak, katukuh tu tusa anikalepacawan nu kanatal a ayawan, naytini i paykanatal nu saka cacay a bataan nu kakakulian a saka enem nu kasinganganan. 1938 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku walu (1938) a mihcaan, Ing-faa kanatal atu Germanyatu Italymasasulit tu Municha kiyakuan a sasulitan, itini kainaian nu Czechoslovakiadayhiw milihida tu kawaw panutek tu nutipanay a lala' Sudetenlandkelicen sipabeli i Germany19393 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu tulu a bataan idaw ku siwa (1939) a mihcaan tulu a bulad, Nazi Germanymaalatu Sudetenlandaniyadu nu likucu, tahekal ku hitay hamin han ku Czechoslovakiamialaw, Germanyitini i Czechiapatideng tu Bohemiaatu Moraviamadiputay a kanatal, Slovakiamapatideng mahiya nu Germanymadiputay a Czechoslovakia.
Slovakiaa niyadu' pakilac sipabeli i Germanya cabay tu Hungary wan-kuo1945 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku lima (1945) a mihcaan, Su-lanpasayda i Dun-oupaculi, u Potsdamnika sasulitan tu Czechoslovakianamaka Praguenutipan hitay nu Amilikamidebung, mapulung tu sudu Praguehiyan nu Su-lana hitay madebung, Czechiaatu Slovakiamapulung aca, kelican nu Germanyatu Cun-yaliku lala' misabaluhayaca mibenis tu Czechoslovakia, nika Zakarpattia Oblastsipakelic i Soviet Uniona Ukrainian Soviet Socialist Republic. 19465-38.6% cacay a malebut siwaw a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku enem (1946) a mihcaan lima a bulat, Czechoslovakiaitini i United StatesSoviet Unionmiliyas satu salihalay satu kunuheni misingkiw, kuncendansayadahay ku nisingkiwan a paya tulu a bataan idaw ku walu tin enem a kilac(-38.6%), amica kuncendanku satabakiay nu dan nika micukelay a tademaw caay ka papina, nika mihantaya tu kuncendana pinapinanu centan caay ka balud ku balucu'. 19485 sakatusa a mihcaan, Slovakianuudip a kawaw caay henay ka hedaek,sakaudip kangelu' an macunus kunikacaay ka hulak nu kawaw nika itini i Stalinmipenec makai tunipipadan nu United States, nina kuncendansifu caay kanamuhi nu tademaw kaisa miduiy itini i cacay a malebut siw a lasubut sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1948) a mihcaan lima a bulad miliyawaca misingkiw. 2. nika tawyaay a mihcaan nu tusa a bulad, kasaupu nu sifu a dumaan nu tan a sakakaay patahekal tu sapiales, midademec tu kuncendanmisa tabaki tu kincal misilud tu kakawawen, sisa mapalekal ku cence kabaliyawan, kuncendanmasakaputay miawaw tu katuuday muculil palekal miyukiw tina kawawan.
imahini u sakakaay katepaan i dadan a mapatay, katuuday sakamusa cinida niuculan nu sifu mipacuk, mahida tuwaca kuncendanpalekal mibabelih, unuheni mikuwan tu aydaay nipisingkiwan, amica ku cungli caay sipaliyuni nika sifu mamin tu u kuncendankusi kawaway. 1948 nika itini i cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu sepat a bataan idaw ku walu (1948) a mihcaan tusa a bulad ninakawaw sa, mala Sulana binawlan nu sehuw cui a kanatal, micumud tu Soviet Unionpatideng tu huasasasulitan anikasakaput atu sakaudip papadang a wiyunhuw. 1960 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan (1960) a mihcaan Czechoslovakiamisumad tu ngangan u Czechoslovak malabinawlanay a sakaputan nu kunhekuo. 1968"" cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu enem a bataan idaw kuwalu (1968) a mihcaan, tawyaay a Czechoslovakia kun-cen-dansakacacaya a mikawaway ci Du'pu-ciekepalekal tu " pulake a satingsing" a sakaudip atu cence' misumada a laylayan, u Sulencaay ka namuh, Sulenmidebung tu Slovakiamilawlaw, pulake a satingsingnamisumad tu laylay hatinitu sa, ciekun sakakaay ci Tupucieke'dakepen patayda i Moscow, Sulana wayway kahiyaan nu kitakit sasakamuensa nu katuuday. 1989111990 cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu walu a bataan idaw ku siwa (1989) a mihcaan cacay a bataan idaw ku cacay a bulad, Czechoslovakiamilaheci ku Sezun a kawaw mahedek tu ku kuncen-danmisataaday a centan, cacay a malebut siwa a lasubu siwa a bataan (1990) a mihcaan, kanatal a ngangan misumad han u Czechiaatu Slovakia lanpan-kunhe-kuo.
